definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: Only 8 of the 58 present at the uncovering of the tomb died within a dozen years.
sentences.chinese: 58人中只有8人在挖墓后的十几年内死亡。

sentences.english: Many of those present felt this atavistic fear.
sentences.chinese: 在场的那些人中，很多都感到这种隔代遗传的恐惧。

sentences.english: The children and horses joined the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们和马儿们便混到这伙人中去了。

sentences.english: In Ghana today, one in two people has access to telecom services.
sentences.chinese: 今天在加纳，每2人中就有1人使用电信服务。

sentences.english: Afterwards, pecking-acupuncture technique was done on Renzhong (GV 26) to achieve strong stimulation for 10 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 继续针刺人中，施雀啄手法强刺激10下。

sentences.english: Mumbai police point the finger at 38 individuals, 35 of whom are yet to be apprehended.
sentences.chinese: 孟买警方指出38人中35人将被扣押。

sentences.english: I seem to be in the minority.
sentences.chinese: 但看起来我只是少数人中的一个。

sentences.english: I should know her among a thousand.
sentences.chinese: 她在千百人中，我也会认识她。

sentences.english: King Solomon conscripted laborers from all Israel-thirty thousand men.
sentences.chinese: 所罗门王从以色列人中挑取服苦的人共有三万。

sentences.english: Out of the eight men who fell in the fight , only three still breathed .
sentences.chinese: 这场战斗中倒下的八个人中有三个还没咽气。

sentences.english: Among the number were Madame Beaufort d'Hautpoul and Marquise Dufresne.
sentences.chinese: 在那一批人中，有波弗多布夫人和迪费雷纳侯爵夫人。

sentences.english: Pontmercy was one of the three who emerged alive from that cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 他是活着离开那坟场的三个人中的一个。

sentences.english: You can never find him in such a large crowd of people. You're looking for a needle in a haystack.
sentences.chinese: 你不可能在一大群人中找到他，你这样是大海捞针。

sentences.english: When interacting with self-centered people, try to do so in a group so that there are others present around and there is a chance to get your point across as well.
sentences.chinese: 当你和他们在打交道时，最好是在一大群人中进行。

sentences.english: Two generations ago, citizens of the United States and China were not able to visit the other country.
sentences.chinese: 在上两代人中，美中两国的公民们还不能相互访问。

sentences.english: Many of the 9 confessors claimed the water had changed temperature.
sentences.chinese: 9人中不少认为是水的温度发生了改变。

definition: winner/lucky guy/person who always gets good breaks
there are plenty of such people
(Chinese) National People's Congress (abbr. for 全國人民代表大會|全国人民代表大会[Quan2 guo2 Ren2 min2 Dai4 biao3 Da4 hui4])/Renmin University of China (abbr. for 中國人民大學|中国人民大学[Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Da4 xue2])
as far as I know/to the best of my knowledge
just a very few (idiom); tiny number/not many at all/You count them on your fingers.
direct line of descent/under one's personal command/school or faction passing on faithfully one's doctrine
